item.title: Best Mob trap :P
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Swastika

The swastika (as a character 卐 or 卍) is a geometrical figure and an ancient religious icon used commonly in the Indian subcontinent, East Asia and Southeast Asia, where it has been and remains a sacred symbol of spiritual principles in Hinduism, Buddhism and Jainism. In the Western world, it was historically a symbol of auspiciousness and good luck; but in the 1930s, it became the main feature of Nazi symbolism as an emblem of Aryan race identity, and as a result it has become stig The name swast...

OP: i made one of these on our old server with varrock and stuff. its worked but not that well… it actually may work better in 1.6 b/c ive noticed an increase of mobs in 1.6 over previous versions. i was actually planning on making a mob trap based off this design with a few modifications on the current server but that project would have took too long and a lot of cobblestone both which i havent enough of.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Mob trap :P
item.dc:creator: @_Ix_Miir_xI .::Ix Miir xI::.
item.description:
@_Ix_Miir_xI wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:7, topic:396855”]o-o that video proved how much stupid people there are… the nazi swastica has a red background with black lining

this is blue and grey… and not tilted… infact you cannot make one in minecraft… its to complex… well you could… it would take awhile getting the angle though…[/quote]
thanks for clarifying, I forgot I was color blind and couldn’t determine angles…

Read full topic
